items.sentence: I don't want to drive. Maybe Tom wouldn't mind driving.
Tom and Mary were both very skinny when they were kids.
Did you know that Tom was planning on moving to Boston?
My brother is very important. At least he thinks he is.
I don't think it was fair for Tom to get all the money.
Tom went on doing that even though we asked him not to.
Why is it easier to stay up late than to wake up early?
Tom drank the glass of champagne that was given to him.
I'm afraid that Tom is going to drink himself to death.
No sooner had I left the house than it started to rain.
